fields.name: AllowPartialScopes
fields.description: Only applicable for tenant and management group level queries to decide whether to allow partial scopes for result in case the number of subscriptions exceed allowed limits.

fields.name: AuthorizationScopeFilter
fields.description: Defines what level of authorization resources should be returned based on the which subscriptions and management groups are passed as scopes.

fields.name: ResultFormat
fields.description: Defines in which format query result returned.

fields.name: Skip
fields.description: The number of rows to skip from the beginning of the results. Overrides the next page offset when ```$skipToken``` property is present.

fields.name: SkipToken
fields.description: Continuation token for pagination, capturing the next page size and offset, as well as the context of the query.

fields.name: Top
fields.description: The maximum number of rows that the query should return. Overrides the page size when ```$skipToken``` property is present.
